name: Dual EM Stars
description: These firearms are designed based on railguns, and must be used in a pair.

skills.normal_des:
Tap normal attack while on the ground to launch up to 5 consecutive attacks with the dual pistols.
First Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Second Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
Third Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
Fourth attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
Fifth Attack: Deal total damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</> and <shuzhi>launch</> the target.
skills.dodge: Tap normal attack after dodging to <shuzhi>strongly suspend</> targets and deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
skills.skill: Fire an energy shield at the target location, reflecting beams within the barrier. Deal damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>, and the last hit <shuzhi>strongly suspends</> targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>45</>-seconds.
skills.discharge: When <red>weapon charge</> is full or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the wielder</>, and create a Domain of Thunder at the target location upon switching to this weapon, <shuzhi>strongly suspending</> targets within the area and dealing a total of <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> damage over 3 attacks to them while dispelling their buffs. The domain lasts for <shuzhi>3.5</> seconds and deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</> to a target every <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.
